info.title: Fhict API
info.description: Please use this to try out our api, and if you want to use it in an app or website, you can request your client credentials here (https://api.fhict.nl/Documentation/RequestAccess)

get.summary: List all our buildings
Get a specific building

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the building

get.summary: List buildings nearby specific location. Lat/long +/- 0.2

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Latitude to search for

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Longitude to search for

get.summary: Request a calendar for a specific group of students/staff members.

parameters.name: kind
parameters.description: Group kind (students/staff)

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Calendar Tag, possible values can be requested with tags/{kind}

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: From which date should the calendar be fetched.

get.summary: Request possible calendar tags for a certain group.

parameters.name: kind
parameters.description: Group kind (students/staff)

get.summary: Fetch all your current canvas courses.
Fetch your current ToDo items from Canvas.

204.description: Currently we don't have any todo-items for you. WOHOO!

get.summary: Fetch your upcoming assignments from Canvas.

204.description: Currently we don't have any upcoming-items for you.

get.summary: Fetch the assignments for a course, you wont get a response if you dont have access
Request personal study results. Always display the 'rights' message in your application.
The text that should be displayed in your app if you show student grades.
Staff members may request results for students. Always display the 'rights' message in your application.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the student (eg. i123456)

get.summary: All the groups your allowed to see.
Details about a specific group.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the group

parameters.name: includeMembers
parameters.description: Whether or not the members should be included.

get.summary: Request the current user's location (you'll need fhict_location)
get.description: Returns partial data from Cisco CMX for the current user Location => GET: All clients https://developer.cisco.com/site/cmx-mobility-services/documents/cmx-10.2-api-reference/index.gsp

get.summary: Request the location of a user, doesn't seem to work right now.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date to return the history for.

get.summary: Count all clients

parameters.name: floorRefId
parameters.description: The floorref ID to filter

get.summary: Get all devices in R1 (anonymised)
Active wifi devices per floor according the CMX.
get.description: Does a query for all clients, groups per 'mapHierachyString' and counts all clients. 10 seconds cache

get.summary: Image of specific floor

parameters.name: campus
parameters.description: Name of the campus

parameters.name: building
parameters.description: Name of the building

parameters.name: floor
parameters.description: Name of the floor

get.summary: Image of a specific floor

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Source as returned from current location

get.summary: Image of a specific floor

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Source as returned from current location

get.summary: Get all clients (NDA restricted)

parameters.name: floorRefId
parameters.description: The floorref ID to filter

403.description: You're not authorized to use this method

get.summary: Get all users in a certain zone (admin only)

parameters.name: zone
parameters.description: A zone defined by FHICT

403.description: You're not authorized to use this method

get.summary: List all available newsfeeds
Request one newsfeed

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type requested from the list query.

parameters.name: items
parameters.description: Number off items to include in the response (15 = default).

get.summary: Request posts of one newsfeed

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type requested from the list query.

get.summary: List all teachers and staff.
Information about the user who authorized the request.
get.description: Only works if you requested the personal scope

get.summary: Search for staff members

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Part of name/office, start of PersonalTitle/Id/Department

get.summary: Information about a specific user

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Username of the user

get.summary: View the scopes of the current token.
View the roles of the current token
View all the claims of the current token.

post.description: This token can only be used in the '/picture' endpoint, like ?access_token=the_returned_token.

get.summary: Request the public image of a user
get.description: Upload your personal picture here (https://apps.fhict.nl/selfservice/Account/Photo). By default you'll get an image of 266x400, but you can request otherwise. See http://imageprocessor.org/imageprocessor-web/imageprocessingmodule/ for parameters.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username of the user you want to get the image for

200.description: You'll get a placeholder, if the image could not be found. You can request a picture token under permissions, and use it like &access_token={here_the_picture_token}

get.summary: Request the official image of a student (for staff only)
get.description: By default you'll get an image of 266x400, but you can request otherwise. See http://imageprocessor.org/imageprocessor-web/imageprocessingmodule/ for parameters.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username of the student you want to get the image for

get.summary: Generate a qr-code based on input data.
get.description: You can request a picture token under permissions, and use it like &access_token={here_the_picture_token}

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data to create a QR code for

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size in pixels. [400]

get.summary: List all the rooms, and it they are occupied.
get.description: Currently only returns rooms from the schedule (since we don't have a database with all rooms yet)

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Specify the date you want to compute the occupance for. (2015-07-28) [default = today]

get.summary: Get your personal schedule.

parameters.name: expandTeacher
parameters.description: Expand the teacher information (default = false)

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Number of days to retrieve (default = 31), 'until = start.AddDays(days)';

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: First day to request format yyyy-mm-dd (defaults = today)

parameters.name: startLastMonday
parameters.description: Request the schedule starting last monday. This overrides the start parameter (default = false)

parameters.name: expandWeeks
parameters.description: Include the schoolweeks in the output (default = false)

parameters.name: includeDeleted
parameters.description: Include the deleted items in the results (default = false)

get.summary: Get all possible values to query the schedule

parameters.name: kind
parameters.description: What kind of autocomplete are you requesting [Any,Class,Room,Subject,Teacher]

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter the possible values [name.ToLower().Contains(filter)]

get.summary: Query the schedule for a specific class/room/subject/teacher

parameters.name: kind
parameters.description: What kind of schedule are you requesting [Any,Class,Room,Subject,Teacher,User]

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The class/room/subject/teacher abbreviation/user

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Number of days to retrieve (default = 31), 'until = start.AddDays(days)';

parameters.name: expandTeacher
parameters.description: Expand the teacher information (default = false)

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: First day to request format yyyy-mm-dd (default = today)

parameters.name: startLastMonday
parameters.description: Request the schedule starting last monday (default = false)

parameters.name: expandWeeks
parameters.description: Include the schoolweeks in the output (default = false)

parameters.name: includeDeleted
parameters.description: Include the deleted items in the results (default = false)

get.summary: Request school week numbers
Request school holidays
View all user defined settings
get.description: You'll only get the settings that start with the used client id.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the setting. Must start with the client-id

patch.summary: Update one setting for the user.

get.summary: Get a single user setting.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the setting. Must start with the client-id

get.summary: Get a single user setting as string.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the setting. Must start with the client-id

get.summary: Get a single user setting as boolean.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the setting. Must start with the client-id

get.summary: Get all Sharepoint Keywords (or a filtered list of keywords). Can be used to search for people

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: keywords.Where(k=>k.Contains(filter));

get.summary: Query people on UserProfile properties

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Some keyword (or advanced query)

parameters.name: includeStudents
parameters.description: Specify includeStudents=true if you also want students

get.summary: Get SharePoint profile for one user

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username for which you want to see the profile.

parameters.name: allowHtml
parameters.description: Some fields could contain HTML, but are converted to text by default. Supply ?allowHtml=true to disable this conversion.

Building.description: This class is used to describe a building

beacons.description: All the beacons in this building

Beacon.description: Describes a beacon located in a building

major.description: Major that describes a building and floor

Calendar.description: A certain calendar, either for students or for teachers.

CalendarItem.description: An item from the shared calendar

is_public_to_auth_users.description: Course is public to authenticated users

link.description: Link to this course on the web

StudyResult.description: A student study result. (Always display the rights url!)

date.description: The date the teacher specified as exam date

item.description: The nice description of the item

itemCode.description: The official code of the item

passed.description: If the student passed with this try, (may not always be accurate)

role.description: Role of the listed user [Administrator (for personal groups)/Member]

updatedAt.description: The date this group was last updated

numberOfMembers.description: The number of members in this group

photoUri.description: Url where the photo can be loaded from (mind the authentication).

NewsItem.description: News item, from a specific feed.

url.description: URL of the information about this user.

displayName.description: Display name formatted like lastname, Givenname initials

photo.description: Photo URL, you'll need to add the token to the url (as ?access_token=) or use the header like you would normally

personalTitle.description: Schedule information either teacher abbreviation or classess

groups.description: Usergroups (only when requesting a single user)

updatedAt.description: Person last updated. (May not be accurate)

RoomOccupancy.description: Room Occupancy where all the hours and set as a bit in an integer.

mask.description: A bitmask of all the hours for this day.

teachers.description: All the teachers in the current schedule

weeks.description: All the current schoolweeks (sadly in dutch)

latestUpdate.description: The higest value of 'updatedAt' or 'deletedAt' of the current Data

updatedAt.description: The timestamp of the last update of this leasson. Only provided for leassons after 2015-11-10

deletedAt.description: The date this lesson is deleted from the schedule. Only provided if you requested to include deleted lessons

Period.description: Period defined by startdate and enddate with a specific title

ScheduleQueryItem.description: Auto-complete of values to request a schedule

name.description: Unique name for requesting the schedule

description.description: Description of the item (only for teachers, contains the teachers name)

ambitions.description: Users takes part in these Ambition themes

contributions.description: Users contributions towards the ambition themes

goals.description: Users goals for the current term.

schedule.description: The Key(s) used in the schedule.

scopes.fhict_location: Wifi location (your app only gets this scope if you have a good reason for it)
